text: This heart gives the smallest glow
I think that i can see it show
Your eyes have a spark, you know
Open them and see me go
This world never knew my game
Hope i have a chance to stay
These arms, are worn, and never fading
The cold air is never waiting
Had me going, my friend
I'm so blind, i can't stand
Left alone with your hand
I think that i can see your eyes
And the past can show you
All the life we've been through
Lost and gone and frozen, but i'm just...
I'm always running
Announcer: Welcome everybody to GAMMA TECHS STADIUM!
Announcer: Ladies and gentlemen, are you ready for some Tempest!?
Theo: That was REALLY uncomfortable. Why do you have so many cars, Lamar?
Lamar: You never know when a fool might want to duel you!
Tari: That's... a lot of people down there.
Announcer: Tonight, 100 players it's 1 to 4 will face off for the chance to win that exclusive player contract with Raptor Gaming!!
Announcer: A lucrative AMD computer sponsorship!
Announcer: And a position in Silica City's Challenges League!
Tari: It... Wouldn't be too late to back out now... would it?
Masa: This is the only private tournament that's still connected to TAS Corp's servers.
Lamar: Yep, and Sofia's had to use every resource we had to sneak us in here. As much as I hate to admit it...
Lamar: This thing is happening.
Announcer: Alright, all competitors are loaded and we are ready to go! Count it down with me folks!

Masa: Stick to the plan! Top of the mountain, no distractions.
Announcer: 8!! 7!! 6!! 5!!

Lamar: See y'all at the other side.
Announcer: 4!!

Theo: Yahoo! Let's go!
Announcer: 3!!   2!!
ZERO!!!
Tari: *GASP*
Tari: Hello?
Tari: Do I know you?
Competitor #1: Hurry up! We need to find some spells!
Competitor #2: FRAZIER!
Lamar: Damn.. We would not have gotten a worse spot!
Theo: Hey guys! Tari's up!
Masa: About time.
Tari: Oh, wait, what happened?
Lamar: You've been knocked out since the game loaded. We had to hold up here just to keep you safe.
Tari: I'm so sorry, this never happened before!
Lamar : LOOK OUT!
Masa: Save it for later. Right now, we need to move out and grab some spells. Let's go!
Lamar: Stay close, Tari! This Force Shield is the only spell we've got right now!
Lamar: How y'all doin'?
Lamar: Damn, dudes! That is obvious bait.
Lamar: Ooh, where'd y'all find such rare gear?
Theo: I... have...
THE POWER, HAHAHA!
[Screaming]
Masa: Second from the left has two A-tier Spells. Team, stay alerted.
Theo: EAT BLOOD!
Lamar: The shield can't take much more, Masa!
Masa: Tari! Theo! Play defense! Lamar, use your Scroll and get us out of here.
Lamar: Way ahead of you. Next stop: wherever the hell this Scroll takes us!
Tari: Agh, dangit!
Theo: haha!
Theo: Lamarrr, hurry up!
Lamar: Y'ALL DON'T THINK I'M GOING AS FAST AS I CAN?!
Theo: Are we dead yet?
Oh, well, this is much better.
Lamar: You all right?
Tari: Hm? Yeah, I'm fine.
Lamar: Sure? Seem a little off your game.
Why don't you take a second and catch your breath?
Masa: We've got bigger problems right now Lamar; you ported us to a cliff and none of us have Mobility Spells.
Lamar: Hey, blame the teleport RNG, not me. I was just trying to get us out.
Tari: Okay, okay. But... where do we go now?
Lamar: To be honest, I don't think we should go anywhere until we figure out what's going on with you.
Tari: What? Nothing's going on with me?
Lamar: You blacked out at the start of the game. What if that happens again during a fight? Or while we're climbing?
Tari: I feel fine! You don't need to treat me like I'm made of glass, Lamar!
Masa: I understand your concern Lamar, but our priority is to get off this cliff. Otherwise, we're just easy kills.
Theo: um...
Guys?
Everyone: WHAT!?
Theo: CRAAACKERJAAAAAACK!!!!
Theo: Abracadabra!
Lamar: Hey y'all, what's good?
Masa: Team!
Masa: Give them hell!
Everyone: RIGHT!
Kevin: Hey guys, thank you so much for watching Meta Runner. Huge shout out to crunchyroll for making this series possible.
You can check out their products by clicking the link in the description below. Meta Runner will be returning next Thursday. Thanks for watching.
